tool_input.command:
export GH_TOKEN="${GITHUB_PAT:-}" && gh pr create --title "feat: #6 - Add selectable color palettes (themes) for the game UI" --body "$(cat <<'EOF'
## Summary

This PR implements a comprehensive theme system for the 2048 game, allowing users to choose between four distinct color palettes: Classic, Dark, High Contrast, and Ocean.

**Implementation Plan:** [specs/issue---skip-e2e-adw-6-sdlc_planner-add-color-palette-themes.md](specs/issue---skip-e2e-adw-6-sdlc_planner-add-color-palette-themes.md)

Closes #6

**ADW ID:** --skip-e2e/6

## What Was Done

- ✅ Created palette system architecture with four themes
- ✅ Implemented React Context-based theme provider with localStorage persistence
- ✅ Built PaletteSelector UI component with visual palette preview
- ✅ Updated Game component to use theme colors for all UI elements
- ✅ Updated Tile component to apply theme colors to tiles and text
- ✅ Maintained strict separation between colors and layout (no sizing changes)
- ✅ Added smooth color transitions for palette switching
- ✅ Created E2E test specification for theme validation
- ✅ Verified TypeScript compilation and production builds

## Key Changes

**New Theme System:**
- `src/themes/palettes.ts` - Defines four color palettes with complete color sets
- `src/themes/ThemeContext.tsx` - React Context provider managing theme state and persistence
- `src/components/PaletteSelector.tsx` - UI component for theme selection

**Updated Components:**
- `src/App.tsx` - Wrapped in ThemeProvider
- `src/components/Game.tsx` - Consumes theme colors for backgrounds, buttons, and status messages
- `src/components/Tile.tsx` - Applies theme-based colors to tiles with smooth transitions

**Testing:**
- `.claude/commands/e2e/test_color_palette_themes.md` - E2E test specification

## Technical Details

The implementation uses React Context to manage theme state globally, ensuring all components access the same active palette. The chosen palette persists to localStorage under the key `2048-palette`, providing seamless user experience across sessions. All color changes are applied with CSS transitions for smooth visual feedback, while layout properties (tile sizes, spacing, fonts) remain unchanged to maintain game integrity.

Each palette includes colors for backgrounds, tiles, text, buttons, and status messages, with careful attention to contrast ratios for accessibility.
EOF
)" --base main
tool_input.description: Create PR with title and body
